note:
Writer: Chorus of Mushrooms, The Kappa Child, Half World, among others. Latest book, GN, Shadow Life. Photography. Still gathering sticks. Queerly, yesssss! W̱SÁNEĆ territory. She/her.

Header image inlet of Salish Sea. A small rounded island looks black in grey water. Sunshine breaks heavy grey clouds. A contrast of dark & light. Foreground is the beach in silhouette. A thin stream is lit up silvery as it trickles into the sea.

Avatar image: Asian middle-aged soft butch wearing red plaid.
